feed.title: FitTrackee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.8.13
entry.content:
Docker images are now available on Docker Hub and GitHub container registry.

Translations

  • PR#667 - Translations update (Galician)

Translation status: - Basque: 100% - Bulgarian: 98% - Czech: 72% - Dutch: 99% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 100% - German: 100% - Italian: 81% - Norwegian Bokmål: 52% - Polish: 100% - Portuguese: 97% - Russian: 62% - Spanish: 100%

Misc

  • #126 - Docker's Container on docker hub
  • PR#673 - Publish package on PyPI using GitHub Actions workflow

Thanks to the contributors: - @DavidHenryThoreau - @xmgz

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.0
entry.content:
FitTrackee now allows you to follow other users, view their workouts according to the level of visibility and interact with them.

The default privacy policy has been updated, as well as the link to the documentation.

[!NOTE] This version also includes the changes from the beta versions.

Features and enhancements

  • #16 - Add social features [1st part]
  • #125 - Add followers/following and visibility levels
  • #296 - Add comments
  • #298 - Add likes
  • #299 - UI notifications
  • #381 - Block a user to hide unwanted content
  • #382 - Moderation tools
  • #655 - Add moderator and owner roles
  • PR#666 - Display last 5 workouts in user profile
  • PR#675 - CLI - create user with provided role
  • #691 Support Markdown syntax in description and notes

Bugs Fixed

  • #664 - privacy policy validation is not displayed
  • #682 - Monthly statistics are incorrect
  • #683 - User time zone is not taken into account in statistics
  • #680 - accessibility and style fixes

Translations

  • PR#688 - Translations update (Basque, Galician)
  • PR#690 - Translations update (English, French, Basque, Galician)
  • PR#692 - Translations update (French)
  • PR#695 - Translations update (Chinese)
  • PR#696 - Translations update (Galician)
  • #697 - [translations request] Chinese (Simplified Han script)

Translation status: - Basque: 72% - Bulgarian: 64% - Chinese (Simplified): 48% - Czech: 47% - Dutch: 64% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 100% - German: 64% - Italian: 53% - Norwegian Bokmål: 34% - Polish: 64% - Portuguese: 63% - Russian: 64% - Spanish: 64%

Misc

  • PR#685 - Update link to documentation

Thanks to the contributors: - @erral - @xmgz - Poesty Li

[!NOTE] If you upgrade from the v0.8.x, there are migrations to apply (see upgrade instructions in documentation)

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.1
entry.content:
[!NOTE] The minimum version for Python is now 3.9.2.

Features and enhancements

  • PR#709 - Display equipment in workout detail for other users depending on visibility

Bugs Fixed

  • #708 - Cannot add/update equipment description
  • PR#707 - Display user workouts only on user profile

Translations

  • PR#700 - Translations update (Chinese (Simplified Han script))
  • PR#702 - Translations update (German, Chinese (Simplified Han script))
  • PR#705 - Translations update (Polish)

Translation status: - Basque: 72% - Bulgarian: 64% - Chinese (Simplified): 100% - Czech: 47% - Dutch: 64% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 100% - German: 76% - Italian: 53% - Norwegian Bokmål: 34% - Polish: 88% - Portuguese: 63% - Russian: 40% - Spanish: 64%

Misc

  • #355 - Update SQLAlchemy to 2.x
  • #685 - replace deprecated datetime.utcnow()
  • b224e17 - tools - update ruff config

Thanks to the contributors: - @OliverPifferi - Poesty Li - Wiktor Jędrzejczak

[!NOTE] This release contains database migration (see upgrade instructions in documentation)

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.3
entry.content:
Features and enhancements

  • #714 - New sports: Kayaking and Canoeing
  • PR#719 - Filter workouts according to visibility in workout list
  • #722 - Statistics per day

Bugs Fixed

  • PR#725 - Workout files upload fixes, including:
  • #716 - Trouble importing tracks
  • #720 - Increase WORKER TIMEOUT
  • PR#728 - fixed docker-compose.yml

Translations

  • PR#713 - Translations update (Basque, German)
  • PR#721 - Translations update (Chinese (Simplified Han script), Galicien, German)
  • PR#726 - Translations update (German)
  • PR#729 - Translations update (Galician)

Translation status: - Basque: 81% - Bulgarian: 63% - Chinese (Simplified): 99% - Czech: 46% - Dutch: 64% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 99% - German: 85% - Italian: 52% - Norwegian Bokmål: 34% - Polish: 99% - Portuguese: 62% - Russian: 39% - Spanish: 64%

Misc

  • PR#717 - Adds YAML bug report template

Thanks to the contributors: - @erral - @LordSexy - @mbw83 - @OliverPifferi - @slackline - @Von-Birne - @xmgz - Poesty Li

[!NOTE] Note: This release contains database migration (see upgrade instructions in documentation)
